```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
manou_candy_data <- read_excel("manou-candy-data.xlsx")
manou_candy_data
```

Visual 1
```{r, include=TRUE}
ggplot(manou_candy_data, aes(x = sugarpercent, y = winpercent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2.5, shape = 15, color = "blue4") +
  labs(title = "Does Sugar Percent Affect Win Percent?",
       x = "Sugar Percent",
       y = "Win Percent")
```

Visual 2
```{r, include=TRUE}
ggplot(manou_candy_data, aes(x = averageprice, y = winpercent, fill = caramel)) +
  geom_point(size = 2.5, shape =  16,) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  ggtitle("Does the Average Price of Caramel Candies Affect Win Percent?") +
  xlab("Average Price ") +
  ylab("Win Percent")
```
